Tools Page

Quick links for all the tools being used

Collaboration/ Communication

# Links Description
1 Slack (free) Team communication tool with chat channels
2 Google Hangouts (free, requires a google+ account) video conference for remote working for small meetings
3 Pivotal Tracker (paid for) Story/ tasks tracking tool with some management information behind it
4 Trello (free) Kanban board for moding stories/ tasks through to done

Technical tools

# Links Description
1 Vagrant (free) Provisions virtual environments with setup scripts
2 Virtual Box (free) A virtualisation product. runs a virtual machine operating system
3 Jenkins (free) - internal installation exists Continuous integration server: deploys, builds and executes tests automatically
4 Testing stack (free) The software explained for cucumber testing with ruby
